roleset.name: be used for the benefit of another
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. Framenet class subordinates_and_superiors. Framed by Katie.

example.name: stooge in comedy act
example.text: He stooges for a popular comedian.

example.name: Stooge for benefit of another
example.text: He stooges for the flamboyant Senator.
